Title: Authorizing the empire state development corporation to retain an independent MWBE consultant firm for the purpose of helping reduce contractor violations of the provisions of article 15-A of the executive law
Summary: Authorizes the empire state development corporation to retain an independent MWBE consultant firm for the purpose of helping reduce contractor violations of the provisions of article 15-A of the executive law; requires contractors in violation of the provisions of article 15-A of the executive law to retain independent monitors to oversee compliance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to authorizing the empire state development corporation to retain one or more independent MWBE consultant firms for the purpose of helping reduce contractor violations of the provisions of article 15-A of the executive law and requiring contractors in violation of the provisions of article 15-A of the executive law to retain independent monitors to oversee compliance
